title: VOLTE is enabled just 2 lines.
content:
I notice VOLTE is unavailable in Korea.
It is normal pixel doesn't compatible any countury unreleased.
But I find very simple method to solve this problem.

mbn_sw.txt is key.
When I add these 2 lines, It works!

mcfg_sw/generic/Korea/LGU/Commercial/mcfg_sw.mbn
mcfg_sw/generic/Korea/SKT/Commercial/mcfg_sw.mbn

So. Could you add just 2 lines to mbn_sw.txt?
It may not seem to help your company, but many potential customers in Korea are waiting for this patch.
Korea customers always want to use pixel with full-function.


Best Regards.
